mapper.update: update process_node set process_id = #{processId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, node_type = #{nodeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pre_node_id = #{preNodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, execute_compoment = #{executeCompoment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_exe_time = #{maxExeTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_sync = #{isSync,jdbcType=BIT}, is_protected = #{isProtected,jdbcType=BIT}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, process_id, name, node_type, pre_node_id, execute_compoment, max_exe_time, is_sync, is_protected, stage, create_time, modified_time from process_node where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, process_id, name, node_type, pre_node_id, execute_compoment, max_exe_time, is_sync, is_protected, stage, create_time, modified_time from process_node
